title: Employees want to sit down less and walk more during work days

title_detail.value: Employees want to sit down less and walk more during work days

summary: Desk-based workers would like to spend less time sitting down and more time walking or doing physical activity as part of their working day, research suggests.

summary_detail.value: Desk-based workers would like to spend less time sitting down and more time walking or doing physical activity as part of their working day, research suggests.
